comment.author: 14865524@N02
comment._content:
Somebody 
PLEASE
P-L-E-A-S-E
tell these guys
that the game is
"ROCK"- "SCISSORS" - "PAPER"
and not just 
rock, rock, rock, and rock...
_____________
Anyway I am glad that
these guys are on 
"the big ring & canvass in the sky"
or they'd probably come hunt me down
and "kick my ass" for sayin' that... 

Though it would probably take them 
some time...
since we have some 
great 
"pubs" & "parlors"
where I live!

IN FACT 
"DUKE'S" 
famous namesake 
IS
"right down the road"
in MALIBU....
___________________
Thanx as always for sharin'...

And
a very
HAPPY 
SPRING
to & for us
&
FALL 
for you...
